prototype
Class XMLWriter

java.lang.Object
  prototype.XMLWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, motej.event.IrCameraListener, motej.event.MoteDisconnectedListener<motej.Mote>
public class XMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements motej.event.IrCameraListener, motej.event.MoteDisconnectedListener<motej.Mote>

Writes IR points to a file in XML format. Based upon the code from the existing video finger tracker.

XMLWriter

public XMLWriter(java.lang.String date,
                 java.lang.String dataPath)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Create a new XML writer.

Parameters:
date - Text representation of today's date (used for header).
dataPath - Path where the output file should be written.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException

addEvent

                     int X,
                     int Y)
add element event as <event fingerID="1" time="33.338" X="100" Y="200" />

Parameters:
FId - Finger ID number
X - X coordinate of the event
Y - Y coordinate of the event.

irImageChanged

public void irImageChanged(motej.event.IrCameraEvent evt)
Called when the Wiimote senses a change in the position of an IR point. Writes the event to a file, if we are currently writing.

Specified by:
irImageChanged in interface motej.event.IrCameraListener

moteDisconnected

public void moteDisconnected(motej.event.MoteDisconnectedEvent<motej.Mote> evt)
Called when the Wiimote disconnects. Finishes writing the XML file.

Specified by:
moteDisconnected in interface motej.event.MoteDisconnectedListener<motej.Mote>

stopWrite

public void stopWrite()
Write the end of the XML file and stop processing points.
